Array: Focus on Lunar Rune to increase party damage.
Restores HP to a single ally.
Press <button="Interact"> near the end to boost.
Garl throws a snack at a friend (medium heal).
Hurl an enemy to another position and reveal 1 lock (+1 per boost).
Dual attack. Can be timed to hit twice.
Area damage. Reveals 1 lock (+1 per boost).

Inspires the target, curing KO'd state and healing slightly.

Arcane damage to a single target. Can be timed for bonus AoE damage.
Press <button="Interact"> on smash for bonus AoE damage.
